New Records: Glenn Maxwell hit the fastest World Cup century in 40 balls.
Australia won by a record 309 runs.
Bas de Leede conceded the most runs in a men's ODI with figures of 2/115.
Adam Zampa now has the most wickets in World Cup 2023 with thirteen scalps.
Pre-Game Insights: Australia won the toss and chose to bat first.
Post-Match Reflections: Pat Cummins expressed happiness with the team's complete game and mentioned room for improvement.
Scott Edwards acknowledged Australia's world-class bowlers and the difficulty of bowling to Maxwell.
Glenn Maxwell reflected on his innings and the confidence boost it provided.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played in New Delhi.
The pitch conditions in Delhi were favorable for batting.
